location: Water storage zone near farm plots, MaMeeFarm, Thailand
title: two_water_barrels_refilled
summary: Two water storage barrels observed filled after refill.
description: This data unit documents the condition of two water storage barrels in the same zone. Each barrel has a capacity of approximately 200 liters, totaling 400 liters. Both barrels were observed after being refilled.

quantitative_note.note: Capacity values are based on known container specification, not measured at capture time.

external_reference.note: Image records post-refill water storage condition.
